ResourceHeader.Description: The valley antenna for VLF/ELF observation was operated from April 1976 to the year 2001. The location (lat/lon) is not accurate. (Exact location is unknown.)
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please contact the principal investigator (PI) of the VLF/ELF observation, Prof. K. Shiokawa (shiokawa at isee.nagoya-u.ac.jp) before using the data. The valley antennas at Kagoshima was developed by a leadership of later Prof. A. Iwai, Research Institute of Atmospherics, Nagoya University. The VLF/ELF observation at the Kagoshima Observatory had been continuouslysupported by late Takasuka (until 1990) and late Koichi Hidaka (until 2007). Both were the technical staffs of ISEE. H. Kogushi and O. Hayashi made the tape list and digitize the tapes since 2007.

InformationURL.Name: ISEE VLF/ELF Data
InformationURL.Description: The history of the configuration and quick-look data are available. All the plotted data and images are just for browsing purpose and are not fully calibrated. Please do not use the data at any presentations and publications without contacting the PI.
